name: JSVirtualMachine
desc: A self-contained environment for JavaScript execution.

items.name: func addManagedReference(Any!, withOwner: Any!)
items.desc: Notifies the JavaScriptCore virtual machine of an external object relationship.

items.name: func removeManagedReference(Any!, withOwner: Any!)
items.desc: Notifies the JavaScriptCore virtual machine that a previously registered object relationship no longer exists.
